me.ashtheking.island

Class ModuleLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.ashtheking.island.ModuleLoader

  • public class ModuleLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    ModuleLoader is responsible for loading and keeping track of all modules that are specified in "mods.config".
    Author:
    Ashwin

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.HashMap<javax.swing.JButton,Module> hash
      A hashmap which is a link between the JButtons and the modules they load
      static java.util.ArrayList<Module> modules
      The list of loaded modules.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ModuleLoader() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void jFrame()
      Launches the JFrame which lists the modules that it has loaded
      static void loadModules()
      Loads all the modules listed inside "mods.config", and adds a ModuleHeight if one is not present already.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
